column4: Hi, i modify the bashrc file, and then when i open a terminal the bashrc file opens too
how can i do to stop open bashrc file when i open a terminal
what did you put in your .bashrc?
i only write 1 line to use adb commands (android sdk)
remove that, does your bashrc still open?
if i remove that the problem still here
did it happen before you edited the file?
no, i dont know why its happening this
its not a big problem, but i have curiosity
its like the terminal open de bashrc file
opens it where?  In what application?
in gedit, open de gedit with the bashrc file
the gedit is open before de prompt line appear
well just check the relevant files in your home I guess
all files are ok, i dont understand this
